game.name: Enishia and the Binding Brand
game.shortDescription: Enishia is a simple nun and the sole manager of the last church in Megista. However, she must pay off a mountain of debt to prevent the demolition of the church and its attached orphanage. How can she make the money she needs?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Enishia is a simple nun and the sole manager of the last church in Megista. However, she must pay off a mountain of debt to prevent the demolition of the church and its attached orphanage. How can she make the money she needs?

reviewHighlights.text: Lots of H scenes and each level of lewd changes the variation of the scene. A recollection room is unlocked early on so it's easy to see which scenes...
